name: Plathopper
description:
This is a small 2D platformer made in Unity as a school project to test how well we have honed our studies so far. 

With a relatively short development timeframe of two and a half weeks we put in 100% to make sure the game looks good and works with as few bugs and issues as possible.  

We decided to go with a pixelated art style to make character, level and background design as simple and effective as possible to ensure we can get a presentable final product.
